title: Simulation Education Design for Enhancing Learner Autonomy in AI-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and social science literacy at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Learner role (student/job seeker), domain expertise (intermediate), subject area (social studies), assessment method (project-based), technology environment (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans when using AI-based educational tools.
Learners enhance knowledge-sharing and collaborative problem-solving skills with peers in cooperative simulation environments.
Learners can analyze ethical issues in digital education (e.g., algorithmic bias, privacy protection) and propose alternatives.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
